## QNRTCAudioMixerEvent interface

导出 RTCAudioMixer 类的事件

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QNRTCAudioMixerEvent 
```

## Events

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [error](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnrtcaudiomixerevent.error.md) | [onError](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onerror.md) | 混音操作发生错误时会触发此回调 |
|  [mixing](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnrtcaudiomixerevent.mixing.md) | [onMixing](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onmixing.md) | 混音操作进行过程中会不断触发此回调 |
